mapper.update: update t_student_code set stuInstitution = #{stuInstitution,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stuMajor = #{stuMajor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stuClass = #{stuClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stuEnteredtime = #{stuEnteredtime,jdbcType=DATE}, stuSource = #{stuSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, stuInstitution, stuMajor, stuClass, stuEnteredtime, stuSource from t_student_code
